p: There was an interaction effect between treatment and year for peak growing season native: non-native ratio, native plant cover and non-native plant cover ( F 10,1245 = 6.98, P < 0.01; F 10,1288 = 3.52, P < 0.01 and F 10,1309 = 10.64, P < 0.01, respectively) so post-hoc comparisons (Tukey–Kramer adjusted) of treatment × year combinations were examined.
